findings.liver: Hepatic contour slightly nodular, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein with hepatopetal flow, and trace perihepatic free fluid.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 8 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Mobile gallstone in gallbladder body, gallbladder is nondistended, minimal gallbladder wall thickening (5 mm), and small pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: Appears within normal limits, without masses or ductal dilation.
